text: Le Chaffaut-St-Jurson is a commune in the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department in southeastern France. ==Geography== The Bl√©one forms the commune's northwestern border. == Transport == === Road === The D8, D12 and D17 roads pass through the commune. == References == Category:Communes in Alpes-de- Haute-Provence
title: Le Chaffaut-Saint-Jurson
